name: fatgpt
description: Browser extension to adjust ChatGPT conversation width for better reading experience
author: Karl Stencell

scripts.build: npm run clean && npm run build:chrome && npm run build:firefox
scripts.build:chrome: cpy icons/**/* dist/chrome/icons --flat && cpy *.js *.html dist/chrome --flat && cpy manifests/manifest.chrome.json dist/chrome --flat --rename manifest.json
scripts.build:firefox: cpy icons/**/* dist/firefox/icons --flat && cpy *.js *.html dist/firefox --flat && cpy manifests/manifest.firefox.json dist/firefox --flat --rename manifest.json
scripts.zip: npm run zip:chrome && npm run zip:firefox
